column1: I have tried other moisturizers with SPF and they felt sticky and heavy on my skin. This stuff feels lovely; I've been using it for years. It is very light weight and breathable, and yet i feel like only a little bit can easily cover my whole face. I use it daily after showering, underneath makeup. I think "complete" is a good name because it has all 3 things i want with one product: moisturize, SPF and antioxidants.

My skin is tricky. It's very fair so I need daily sunscreen in California, but sunscreens always break me out. The SPF 15 is enough for daily use under my make-up. I use it twice per day, on my hands, neck, chest, and arms. I found I was breaking out from sleeping with heaver lotions on my arms (like I said, tricky). I slather it on, it's so inexpensive. I even put it on my lips to protect them from the sun too. When I need a stronger SPF, I use the Oil of Olay Facial sunscreen in 50 SPF. Love Oil of Olay products!
I switched to this moisturizer after finding several other brands with SPF included felt a bit thick and greasy on my face. This leaves my skin soft with zero breakouts.
great face moisturizer!!! I love that it has sunblock in it too! It's a light face cream ans does not feel heavy or sticky or thick. This face cream goes on light and smooth! I just love it!
Great for someone with combination skin.
Is great, inexpensive and helps my face with the oils.
this product has kept my skin a youthful looking and feeling
I have oily skin but the combination/oily Moisturizer leave my face very shinny. I don't need the extra shin.

I first got this moisturizer because I saw a favorite Youtuber mention it. I decided to give it a try because I have oily skin. The first couple days I started using it I saw a drastic change in my skin and how much the oil had reduced. I loved that the moisturizer had sunscreen in it because then I can skip that step in my skincare routine. This moisturizer has no smell which I love and I love the fact that it lasted me a few months. I have been repurchasing this for two years now. #contest
Even though you have oily/combo skin, you MUST moisturize. And this is a great product for that skin type. My favorite product!!!
I RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT VERY HIGHLY,THE WAY THAT IT MAKES YOUR SKIN FEEL IS TRULY AMAZING I CAN NOT STRESS HOW AMAZING GIVE IT A TRY I'M POSITIVE THAT YOU WILL LOVE IT AS MUCH ARE MORE AS I DO.
My sister recommended this to me and I'm so glad she did. This makes my skin feel amazing. It's so much more hydrated and feels a hundred times better than it used to.
Been using this for years....love it!
Olay Complte All Day Is a great,much better than some of those expensive lotion.
First time I use a moisturizer cream.And I really loved this one.I have 2 weeks with it.And I can tell the difference on my face..

I bought this product in hopes that it could be added to my daily routine in trying to keep my skin healthy and young unfortunately after the first use my face started to break out and it left my face very shinny and felt a little heavy when I put it on I used it again the next day and my breakouts got worse I have kinda oily skin that may get a pimple once every couple months I wouldn't recommend this product

I live in FL, where the sun is a constant battle. I enjoy being tan, but I do not want the wrinkles that go along with a tan. I've use Olay daily moisturizer every day and people consistently card me, or think I'm younger than what I look like- I just turned 35yrs old. I think my young look is definitely attributed to the daily use of Olay face moisturizer. I highly recommend that all girls and ladies use this product.

It still feels greasy on my skin which is weird because it says it is for combo/oily skin. I do not like the way it feels under my make up. Not a fan of the sunscreen scent either. HOWEVER, it does make my skin feel really soft and moisturized. I will continue to use it until I find another Olay product that does not feel so heavy.

I love all of Olay products that l have used. This being one of my favorites. I love the pretty package, l know right where to go to find it. I love the SPF is there for an added protection and it doesn't leave greasy feeling or smell. It feels so creamy and lush on. I recommend all buy this. I was asked to give my honest opinion from @influenster and @olay so l could join a #contest. This is true and my own opinion. #influenster #olay from @wildfirekristin

I have been using this product for over two years now, and I am very satisfied with the look of my skin. My skin feels very smooth and soft, and it has prevent wrinkles on my face. I will definitely recommend this product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

My grandmother and my mom used Oil of Olay and had beautiful skin with very few lines or wrinkles. I am 46 and don't have wrinkles or crepey skin. I love the brand and will continue to use it. Give it a try. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have pretty oily skin and am prom to breakouts. I have to be careful about which lotions I use, because it can cause my face to get oily and break out. This product is awesome! I am pleasantly surprised at how well this moisturizers my face without leaving it feeling oily. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Out of all the products I have used this is my favorite and I have used this moisturizer since I was a teen!!! No kidding!! my mom used this and I would sneak and use it too!!! My kids use as well... love it!!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have combination/oily skin and this moisturizer left my face feeling oily after applying it. I wouldn't recommend this product for my type of skin, except in the winter, when my skin tends to become slightly dry. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have been using this daily for over 30 yrs ,would not use another product also have been using the daily face cleaners for the same amout of time and have never had any facial problems with my skin [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Using Olay All Day Moisturizer with SPF 15 has been great. I have combination , oily skin and I'm 50 years old. This moisturizer has worked great with my skin and I am not at all shiny by mid day. Great sun protection as well. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I especially like the Olay complete all day moisturizer with sunscreen and SPF 15 protection because it is light and absorbs quickly. My skin is left with a soft feel. It is not at all sticky or greasy. This light moisturizer is just perfect under makeup during the day. It is also a great choice to apply to clean skin before sleeping to wake up with great looking skin.This product can't be beat. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have been using Olay products for over 40 years and certainly notice the great look I have at 62 years old. Most people are surprised at my age and I contribute it to using Olay for so many years. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have used theComplete All Day Moisturizer with sunscreen for many years. My skin stays soft and I love the sunscreen in it. My grandchildren make many comments on how soft my skin is and I make sure my teenage granddaughters have this product to use daily. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I loved using this product. I use it every night after I shower. My face didn't look so dry or oily, it just seemed to be just right. I love the smell, I even use it on back of my hands. Every time I use it my son tells me I smell good. But I like that fact that I can tell a difference with my face and loving the smell is just a bonus. :) [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Olay Moisturizer is a staple of my everyday life, I have used this product faithfully for over 30 years to date and have not experienced a better result from any other moisturizer. Besides the suppleness and elasticity, my face continues to have a smooth and glowing tone. Even though the price has increased and portions decreased over time, I will continue to purchase this product as I couldn't be more pleased with its results. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I've been using this moisturizer complete with SPF 15 FOR OVER 10 YRS NOW, I LOVE IT N I WILL CONTINUE TO USE IT IN THE FUTURE. IT'S GOT VITAMINS E B3 & C IN IT N I LOVE TO USE IT ON MY FACE N NECK. THANKS OLAY MY FACE LOOKS SO YOUNG BECAUSE I HAVE PEOPLE ASKING ME ABOUT HOW YOUNG I LOOK N I'M 58 NOW. KEEP UP THE GOOD WORK U R DOING ! THANKS !

I just wanted to write to let you know how impressed I am with your All Day Moisturizer with Sunscreen. I applied this lotion on my face, neck and hands in the early morning and after sitting at a track meet all afternoon I was very sunburned on my arms and legs but my face, neck and hands were protected by your product. Thank you Oil of Olay, I have and will continue to promote your product...

I've been using this product on my face and neck since I was in high school. I wash my face every day, then apply. It has kept my face smooth and blemish-free. I'm now 24 and constantly have compliments on my amazing complexion. Definitely WOULD recommend!

Love this product. I have sensitive skin and have no problem! Highly recommend. Leaves my skin feeling smooth and not oily like most do. I put it on 10-15 minutes before any foundation,when I do decide to wear foundation, and the foundation goes on so evenly.

I have been religiously and consistently using oley complete for more that 13 years now. I can honestly say that it works no question about it. It keeps my skin looking young. It has keep wrinkles in check or better at bay. People cannot tell my age by th look of my face and that is amaIng. I love it and will continue using it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was 22 I looked in the mirror I saw a little line I didn't like.Next day I went shopping I saw a bottle OIL OLAY I picked it up and never put it down. I'm 62 now I have a few lines that I don't like but I look good at age 62.I remember running out and didn't have the money to get it and one of my 3 girls would get for me.I just cut my bottle into so I got to go shopping..OLAY YOUR NUMBER ONE IN MY BOOK [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have used OLAY Complete for years and would never consider changing. I use it morning and night and no matter who tells me to use a different product I would never consider changing. No other product works for me they way Olay Complete does. As I said I have used it for over 15 years. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I keep coming back to this moisturizer because it is perfect for my skin. I've tried others and have never been satisfied with the way they feel when applying or after. This makes the perfect base for makeup. It absorbs quickly and does not feel greasy. It never burns or irritates like other brands. Love it! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I've been using this for many years and is my favorite!!! i've tried other brands but i always come back to this!! It's definitely a tradition, my mother used Olay as a young girl and still does... She has aged so well and people think we are sisters!!:) [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have used this product for many years and am very satisfied with the sun protection and the feel and look of my face and neck. I have been told many times that I don't look 62 and I usually don't wear any makeup, only the Olay Complete Moisturizer. Love it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I started using this after growing up seeing my mom use it for years. Her results was amazing skin and this was a good enough testimonial for me. She is 58yrs old and her skin looks like she's 30. This product works great on my combination skin without irritating it and gives it a soft, smooth, dewy look. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I've been using this product for over 11 years and i absolutely love it. I ventured out a couple of times to try other products but nothing compared to it. What I love the most is the consistency and how easy it gets absorbed. I love it so much that my husband is also an avid user of my moisturizer. He agrees that the youthful look of his skin is thanks to never skipping a day. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Used complete all day moisturizer on my tan/spotty skin which tends to dry out quickly especially after a shower. After three weeks of application, my skin tone is even with less patchy white spots and less wrinkles with a fresh look. I apply it daily after my shower and now I do like the feel and texture of my skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I've used this moisturizer for over 5 years and its proven to be perfect for my skin. Im in the sun alot at Arts & Crafts shows and my face doesn't burn. I have very few freckles, no age spots and get told that I look over10 years younger than my age all the time. Actually, people think I'm my 17 year old daughter's sister. That always makes me happy! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I chose this moisturizer because my mother used these products when i was a child. This product is so light, and non greasy. I also feel great knowing that I have sunscreen on under my make up. The bottle lasts a very long time, and is reasonably priced. The best part is, anyone can use it. From age 20 to age 60. Its just a wonderful product, made by a wonderful company. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have been using Olay for 30 years. I am now 75 years old and my skin has very few wrinkles and is very soft and supple. People tell me how beautiful my skin is and that I look like like I'm 55 - 60 [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have used this prudct since i was 16 years old and have used for MANY years now. I love the way it is easy to use and it feels nice on the skin and moisturizes under my make up every day. SPF is a great benefit. thank you [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I like my mother before me have used Oil of Olay Moisturizers for most all of our lives. I especially like that SPF 15 sunscreen is included in the moisturizer now for all my outdoor "Fun in the Sun" days playing tennis and golf. Thank you OIL of OLAY! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have been using this product for many years now because my mother & sister use it and it actually has kept my face looking youthful. I have gotten many complements regarding "I don't look my actual age of 51" many times. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I absolutely love this moisturizer; it gives the right amount of moisture without oiliness and the spf in it protects my skin so I know I'm taking good care of it! I use this everyday after washing my face, it truly is my go-to! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I use this product every day. It helps reduce lines around my eyes. It is a great sunscreen both in winter and summer. I have recommended this product to my daughters to keep there young skin healthy. Use this product to avoid the aging the sun can do to your skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I use this product for all seasons. I apply over homemade serum for a good finishing and sun protection! Didn't start the serum until it was too late, sigh. With the Olay over the serum, I can keep anymore wrinkles at bay. Mom kept giving me Oil of Olay back when I was in my 50s, Discovered (too late) that with the newer product with sun screen was a better blend for me.! Really pleased! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love this as a light moisturizer in the morning before I put on my makeup. I have oily skin so I always hate putting greasy lotion on, but this product is great! It absorbs fully without making my skin look too oily [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This moisturizer is great under makeup. I like that it has SPF 15. It doesn't feel greasy at all. I put it on liberally and wait a few minutes and it absorbs perfectly. Then I put on my makeup and it glides on with no problems. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Have used this product for over 35 years. I use it in the morning and at night. My face has very few wrinkles. I am 70 years old and people always ask what I use on my face. When I tell them, they are amazed. I also use the foaming face wash sensitive or regular. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This is the best moisturizer for under make up I have found. I have spent a lot of money on the pricey moisturizers that did not do what they claimed. This make my face feel so soft and helps my makeup go on smoothly. And it has sunscreen! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have been using Oil of Olay for approx. 30 yrs. on my face as a moisturizer before I put my make up on in am and after I take it off every night. I will not use anything else !! This moisturizer keep my skin, smooth, soft and wrinkle free. Great product !! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Olay products has been in my family of woman for many generations. I recall my grandmother always applying the product which was called then Oil of Olay to her face and always explaining the importance of taking care of your face and body. Now two generation down and Olay is the first moisturizer applied every morning to our face and neck . My mother, myself and my three daughters continue to use the moisturizer. Thanks Olay for keeping us beautiful. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product is great! I have been using it daily for the last 11 years. I appear younger than I am and I believe I owe a great deal to the Olay products I use. I don't have very many wrinkles, my skin is very soft and I love that it has built in sunscreen. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have been using this product for over 20 years. I love how it doesn't feel greasy on my skin. I love that it contains SPF 15, because I never have to worry about going outside without any sunscreen protection on my face. I don't know if it's the lotion that I have been using for over 20 years, but I have people tell me that I don't look my age. Thank you Oil of Olay. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I'm 54 and have used your products for about 10 yrs and ppl comment all the time that I look like I'm in my early 40s. I've had friend who sell Mary Kay and have tried to get me to switch but I can't imagine anything else working any better, except botox, maybe...lol [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I had stop using moisturizer at all at one point. I just could not find the right balance, that is, until I started using Oil of Olay. The oily parts of my skin do not look greasy anymore and the dry parts are not flaky. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I Started Using Complete All Day Moisturizer Broad Spectrum SPF-15 Combination/Oily many years Ago. I Highly Recommend this Product Because It is a Wonderful Product. I Enjoy Using Complete All Day Moisturizer Because I get Very Good Results.My Face Always Feels So Nice And Smooth,It is Such a Wonderful Feeling.I Will Continue to Use This Product and Encourage Ladies to Try if They Want To Feel Beautiful,Because It is the Best. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have been using Olay Complete for years and really happy with results, it goes on smooth, not greasy and great for dry skin under foundation which is applied before foundation and really helps to set makup and keeps my skin feeling /looking hydrated! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I use this product when I am not going to be out in the sun very much. Otherwise, I will use the spf 30 moisturizer. I like both products and I like how they feel on my skin. They go on nicely and are not oily. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have only used this product for the last 20 years!!!! I LOVE that it is the only thing I need in my face, I know it's keeping my face protected with the high altitude. I have taught my daughter how important it is to have the right moisturizer can do for your face. I can't imagine not having this product in my daily routine, it makes my face feel clean and light and protected!!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have been using the Complete All Day Moisturizer for about 10 years now and it's the only one I use. Light to wear and great it has SPF so I don't have to worry about everyday sun protection on my face. Goes on great before my makeup each morning. I recommend this to all my family to use. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Always start my day with Olay Moisturizer. Started back way back in 1980's, recommended by mother and her mom, avid users as well. We heart this product. Now that I am 40+ I am often told I don't look a day past my age. WORKS FOR ME [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have been using this product for years. I have combination skin and other products were to heavy. This product gives the right amount of moisture throughout the day. Plus, I have fair skin and having a SPF 15 is a bonus!!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I would recommend this product to anyone young or old any time of the day to start using it with they haven't used it yet. Due to the fact its the best ever product that i have been using since i was 18 and now i am 34 years old and i still looked 18. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Okay Complete All Day Moisturizer with sunscreen Broad Spectrum SPF 15 - Combination/Oily is my number one choice, especially in the summer. It is light and moisturizing, yet contains SPF without causing my face to breakout. Love it! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was looking and serching for a good moisturizer. This one caught my attention because of all the good stuff it claims to have. I bought it yesterday and oh do it have a strong smell!! It was overwhelming! If I knew, I would probably not buy it. Please take the fragance away! On the positive side I love the feeling and how it held up my makeup.

I was pleased with the feel of my skin after using the Olay Complete with SPF 15. It has a nice scent, and it is barely noticeable (feeling) on my skin after I apply it. I use topical medication on my face 20 minutes prior to applying Olay Complete, and the Olay Complete does not aggravate my skin or counteract the medication. I am so pleased to have the SPF already in the product because I have had sun damage over the years.

I hated all face sunscreen because I would always get terrible blocked pores and acne (even cystic). I finally found the one. The sensitive skin one I use is very light weight and doesn't cause me any problems. It doesn't feel like sunscreen is on, with that mask-like feeling. You may need to reapply if you're sunbathing or sweating. Oh yeah, it doesn't really burn the eyes like so many do. I was happy to find my miracle!

I HAVE USED OLAY BEFORE AND DECIDED TO BUY THE MORE EXPENSIVE FACE LOTION BUT I CAME BACK TO THIS PRODUCT BECAUSE IT "WORKS" FOR MY OILY SKIN. MY SKIN LOOKS FRESH EVERY MORNING WHEN I WAKE UP. THIS LOTION IS SO MUCH BETTER THAN THOSE EXPENSIVE PRODUCTS. SAVE YOUR MONEY AND BUY THIS PRODUCT.

I used Olay as a teen but then switched to more expensive brands. My skin has changed and became extremely sensitive with age. I now use this product in Sensitive. It is great! Lightweight but seriously moisturizing. The SPF will be tested during the summer months, but I have faith it will hold up to the test.(Most with SPF's break me out with the first use, but not this one.)

I love the complete lotion. I use it at night before bed and in the morning. It has just enough spf for my face. When I turned 30 I started having acne problems and that led to scarring. I have been using Complete and have noticed a huge difference in my face. I feel confident and my scars are fading. I'm not saying this is fading cream but I believe over time the scars fade and the complete lotion has helped keep my skin healthy and beautiful. I also had acne on my chest. I don't know why but it has also disappeared. I love it.

This product is great! At first I didn't think it was going to work, and it even made my skin flake a little in the beginning. Though after using the product for about two weeks my skin got use to it and it started completely moisturize my skin. Be a little patient if you are switching moisturizers and let your skin get use to it. It's amazing! The best moisturizer I've used, out of Marykay and Clinique!
Smells very strongly of sunscreen-not what I want to smell like all day or have to smell. Only used it once and bought Olay moisturizer without it which I really like.

I have been using the all day moisturizer for over 15 years. It is one of the few products that I have stayed with for that long. It is safe, light and I can always rely on it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Great - goes on smooth , not greasy. A product that makes me feel confident about my skin. I always ask for this at Christmas & Santa never fails!!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
This product is the best moisturiser I've tried. Soaks in well and skin is way younger looking. It has also cleared my skin up I love it!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I love using this moisturizer. It leaves my skin soft and instantly relieves the dry feeling. It absorbs quickly and makes my skin look refreshed. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love moisturizing lotion as it keeps my face soft protects from the sun's rays. Even through hot flashes, my face still holds up. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Great moisturizer that feels like you are not wearing it and it dries fast. I also like it because it contains SPF 15 and it is great for my skin type which is combination skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I can't say enough for this product, I have been a user for about 30 years and its the best. I don't look a day over 54 years old. Thank you Oil of Olay. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

My husband has extremely dry skin. He also forgets to put sunscreen on. Since he uses this each morning for at least 10 years, at least he is getting some protection and good moisturizer. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
To reserve your skin you must start young. I started using Olay at a young age and the benefit have been great especially now that I'm 60. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
This product has very good features. I've tried a few others, but none can compare to the Olay Anti-Aging. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I've used this basic moisturizer with sunscreen forever - I mean for decades! I've always been told I look much younger than I actually am. I attribute it to this moisturizer AND avoiding the sun! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have used this product for years. I love it so much that I will not use anything else. My grandma used it too, since she was young. She is the reason I started using it. It is soothing! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
makes my skin feel so soft and young. I love that it has spf to fight my age spots from when I didn't use sunscreen! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have used the original Oil of Olay for 40 years! Even when I was a Mary Kay beauty consultant. I have tried many products but always come back to Oil of Olay. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
This product has changed my skin care, I have been using it for years and will continue. I love it! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I will not go a day without this on my face.. absolutley love this and it doesnt make my face hot or shiny or feel like i have a coat on my face. Now my daughter uses this and she love it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This moisturizer is amazing, very light and silky. I use all day, everyday and my skinn feels great, at the same is protected with soft 15. I wouldn't use any other moisturizer. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I use this product every morning. It provides great moisture to my skin after a shower and has SPF in it so I don't need to use an additional product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This moisturizer is great for my skin. It is easy to apply, leaves my skin soft and supplements without the greasy feeling. The added benefit of the sunscreen is great since I have fair skin tone. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Love this product. Good sunscreen, but it is light. My skin is really oily in the summer and this doesn't add to the oil. The price is right too. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have used these cloths for years now and they are the best for cleaning off all of my makeup after a full day of wear!! My face feels so clean after every use [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have been using Olay Moisturizer for years. It goes on light and gives me the protection I need. It the perfect compliment to any foundation. Highly recommended. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Have been using Olay products for many years. The Complete is a reasonably priced product with great results. Excellent for sensitive skin. My go to product [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I am African American and I have used this product for over 50 years. I am 71 years old and most people think that I am at least 10 to 15 years younger. I couldn't ask for anything better. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
This moisturizer leaves my face very soft and hydrated. It has a very light texture and it doesn't clog my pores. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
From the scent that reminds me of both my mother AND grandmother, to the latest advantage of a broad spectrum sunscreen, I STRONGLY recommend this and all the other Olay products:)
I simply love Olay moisturizer because it wakes up my skin. It really provides great protection from the sun, seeing that I burn so easily. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I live in TX, so it's important for me to have a nice breathable face lotion with sunscreen to protect my skin. I have used this product for years, and I continue to love it! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Olay's All Day Moisturizer with sunscreen is wonderful to use every day for protection from the sun and to protect your skin. Don't leave home without it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This is such a great product. It goes on very smoothly. Not tacky feeling at all. Great for oily skin like I have. I am 57 but still have slightly oily skin. Doesn't feel greasy at all. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
